go_data.justification: The COP9 signalosome (CSN) is known for its role in protein deneddylation, although the text does not explicitly state this, it is implied through the mention of CSN.
None found, however CSN is typically found in the cytoplasm and nucleus.
The COP9 signalosome (CSN) mediates the CRL4(DDB2) inhibition, which suggests a role in regulating protein catabolism.
